Topic.Title: [Solved] Quest 6 - Remove default room name prefix

Posts.EditableText:
Whoops, it's yet another thread.
I've been searching through the code for a while now, but I  can't seem to find a way to disable the default room name prefix (i.e, the word "The" it insists on putting before everything).
